long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrightFlag Candidate Connect makes it easier to monitor status of a job candidate on Indeed. It connects to your CRM account to determine to if candidates have previously applied. It also updates candidate info. This makes it much easier to  track candidates that apply for a job.
